code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./Courses.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CourseList=()=>{const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchCourses=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:4000/api/courses');setCourses(response.data);setLoading(false);}catch(err){setError('Failed to fetch courses');setLoading(false);}};fetchCourses();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"courses-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Available Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"courses-grid",children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:course.thumbnail,alt:course.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:course.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:course.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",course.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[course.rating," \u2B50"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/courses/".concat(course._id),className:"view-course-btn",children:"View Course"})]})]},course._id))})]});};export default CourseList;
